improvement_list.improvement_desc: The loop will not execute for n<4 because the range will be empty. Consider adding a check for n<4 to avoid the loop for such cases.

The test cases cover several scenarios. However, to make it more robust, consider adding additional edge cases such as very large prime numbers, very large composite numbers, and numbers close to the limits of the integer type.  Also, the test cases can be improved by adding assertions to check if the result matches the expected value.
